attributes.action: Remove all drivers and vehicles without  tax and insurance from our roads
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are thouands of drivers on our roads without tax or insurance which is often reported and nothing done about it.
A determined effort by the government is needed to erradicate these dangerous people from our roads.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
